column3: Greetings, good \x02\x08\x0f\xe9\x05\xff\x06madam\xff\x04sir\x03. My name is Claribel, and I have the honor to assist those happy couples who wish to be joined in the sight of gods and men.

The special quest \xe2\x80\x9cThe Ties that Bind\xe2\x80\x9d is available to those who have completed the quest \xe2\x80\x9cThe Scions of the Seventh Dawn\xe2\x80\x9d and have obtained a promise wristlet.
There exist three varieties of wristlets, each of which may be acquired via the Mog Station.
Wristlets are sent to you via the moogle delivery service. By equipping a wristlet, the aforementioned quest will become available from Claribel.
When accepting this quest, please ensure that you are in a party of two with your partner, who must also be equipped with a wristlet.

Good \x02\x088\xe3\xe9\x0c\r\xff\x1a\x02\x08\x16\xe3\xe9\x0c\x05\xff\x08evening\xff\x07morrow\x03\xff\x17\x02\x08\x13\xe3\xe9\x0c\x12\xff\x04day\xff\x08evening\x03\x03 to you, my \x02\x08\x0f\xe9\x05\xff\x05lady\xff\x05lord\x03. I trust you have been well.
It was an honor and a pleasure both to serve you. If there is aught else I might do for you, please do not hesitate to ask.
Do you require help with something?
No, thank you. Everything is well.
Actually...I'm thinking about holding another ceremony.
I am glad to hear that. May the Twelve ever shine their countenance upon you and your beloved.
Another ceremony, my \x02\x08\x0f\xe9\x05\xff\x05lady\xff\x05lord\x03? I take it to mean that you wish to be joined to another. I shall explain the process that you may undertake to begin anew.
If you wish to form an eternal bond with a new partner, you must first have your existing bond annulled by relinquishing your eternity ring to the Sanctum acolyte.
Next, log in to the Mog Station and acquire a new promise wristlet, which will be sent to you via the moogle delivery service.

By equipping a wristlet, the special quest \xe2\x80\x9cThe Ties that Bind\xe2\x80\x9d will become available from Claribel. When accepting this quest, please ensure that you are in a party of two with your partner, who must also be equipped with a wristlet.
